Text: Saw thqat other copies were out of sync so didnt download whats the A V for this one?? 1776 leaching mothers with no comments?!
Video is good, audio is good.  I haven't watched it yet, but I did skip around and did not notice any synch issues using Media Player Classic.
This copy sucks, won't stream to my PS3 and it doesn't look good at all... I would try another rip.

A V are perfect. Been watching it on my xbox without any problems or sync problems. If you find the quality not to your liking try burning it onto a DVD with convertx2DVD which will make a 700 mb file into a 4.3 gb.

This isn't the director's cut either; none of the rips available right now are the dc.
If you've seen the theatrical release then you'll notice that there's nothing different.... so, this is a 'fake'
